content: Bank Account Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 06 Nov 2018Is it easy to get DBS to waive off CC annual fee?I'm thinking to apply for DBS Women Card/DBS CC, to get more multiplier interest. However I would like to find out if it is easy to have them waive off the CC annual fee? Or are they very strict about this?5 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (5)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 24 Aug 2019Yup! I would say that they are quite consumer-friendly in that sense.0 comments2

Cedric Jamie Soh, Director at Seniorcare.com.sgTop Contributor (Sep)Level 7. Grand MasterAnswered on 28 Aug 2019Yes. Not just DBS, but almost every bank in Singapore now has an automated system to waive off the credit card fees or other fees. They do not want their customer service officers to spend time on this too.You just call the hotline listed at the back of your credit card, and the automated telephone system eventually will have a "Press X if you are calling to waive off your credit card fees"Bonus: no talking needed!0 comments1
Ernest Yeam Wee LeongLevel 5. GeniusUpdated on 28 Aug 2019For DBS Credit card fees waiver is quite fast.Did it via iBanking and it was done within 3 days.Attached images for references.0 comments0
Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 24 Aug 2019DBS is quite generous as long as you use their cards and products. Calling them or using iBanking works.0 comments0
Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 07 Nov 2018dbs is the easiest. just submit the form via ibanking. just click click done.0 comments0
